name: Niko
description: Neoki is a decentralized Matrix platform with the vision of democratizing the world of design and creativity from fashion to gaming, interior design, architecture, art, beauty, etc . Neoki is giving power back to creators and enabling younger and smaller players to access opportunities around the globe as well as access to talent for premium players. Neoki is creating a democratized, inclusive shared economy with brands, designers and fans and empowering creators to shape the future. With multiple components such as : NFT & Twin marketplace, MultiMetaverse, Token, DAO, Digital Wardrobe, AI Avatars, and Digital asset creator and Lands, Neoki is the one stop every creator would wish for
